channel.title: American Horror Story
channel.description:
Might I be the first here to say that Lily Rabe is one smoking hot tamale. American Horror Stories is an anthology TV series. Every season is a new story. Being an anthology series comes with its perks and letdowns in which some seasons are just to darn juicy to let go of. Each season goes into a lot of detail with character development and tense relationships. Some parts of each series you cant help but pull the holy shit card, but unlike most tv series or movies they actually do a good job with helping you understand the situation or connection. AHS has the holy shit factor with no bullshit. I rate it 8.9/10 tabbies!
Season 1: Murder House Season 2: Asylum Season 3: Coven
What do you think Season 4's topic will be and what is your favorite?

item.title: American Horror Story
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

It’s pretty amazing, they have odd story lines that keep you watching.

Read full topic

item.title: American Horror Story
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Season 4 is taking place in the 1950’s. This is 5 years after Hitler died and the instrument of surrender was signed. So I bet we can expect some Nazi action in this season, which I hope will link to Dr Arthur Arden from season 2. I really do hope they keep the fictional horror story aspect of the show and not lead down the path of history.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Heard a lot of great things about this, probably catch an episode of this soon.

item.title: American Horror Story
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

American Mild Suspense Story. It has a ring to it.

item.title: American Horror Story
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

Soulcist:

My mother is in love with it. I suppose when I have a chance, I will sit down and give it another shot.

Go for it. All 3 seasons are on Netflix right now. (:

item.title: American Horror Story
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

Uncalled:

It doesn’t deserve the title “horror story”, you’re right. I watched the first season and I’m getting into the second one. It’s a pretty decent show, I must say.

More of ‘Mild Suspense’.

None the less, its a great show. I loved season 2.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:

It doesn’t deserve the title “horror story”, you’re right. I watched the first season and I’m getting into the second one. It’s a pretty decent show, I must say.

item.title: American Horror Story
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Just finished watching the finale of season 3. It wasn’t the big bang I was hoping for and I was a little bit disappointed on some parts. It really doesn’t deserve the title “horror story”. It’s still a great show don’t get me wrong with that.

Read full topic

item.title: American Horror Story
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

At first, when this show first started, I had no idea that it would be different every season. I’ve watched most of the episodes from the first two seasons, but none from Coven. It’s a really interesting show.

Read full topic

item.title: American Horror Story
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Despite its name I get the vibe that the show really isn’t generally a horror story. It really is all just modern day myths come to life. Give a few episodes a try, you might just get hooked.

Read full topic

item.title: American Horror Story
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Never watched it. All the “horror” type of films or shows I’ve just found utter garbage, so I haven’t bothered to watch it.
